## ImageCache.findImage() method

Find \[\[ImageItem\]\] for the specified URL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findImage(url: string): ImageItem | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | URL of image. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| undefined

`ImageItem` for the URL if the URL is registered, `undefined` otherwise.
